response.summary:
I am passionate about sustainability and participating in co-creation spaces that include solutions for economic growth with social and environmental innovation. I trust the strengths of my teammates as part of effective teamwork, I like to listen actively to them, discover shared values and empower them to achieve the proposed goals.

The curiosity of learning about new fields of study has allowed me to adapt quickly to new environments and organizational cultures. I believe that, with patience, determination and active listening, a team can be led towards overcoming all challenges.
response.skills: Liderazgo, Trabajo en equipo, Resiliencia, Resolución de problemas, Sostenibilidad, Lean Six Sigma, Investigación y desarrollo, Análisis de datos, Liderazgo de equipos, Inteligencia emocional, Comunicación asertiva, Desarrollo personal, Responsabilidad, Planeación estratégica, Manejo del tiempo, Adaptación, Cultura organizativa, Transformación digital, Desarrollo de presentaciones, Leadership

profile_positions.description:
Research Internship in Power Plants and Renewable Energies Laboratory as part of final degree project.

Activities:
* Internal inventories and designation code assignment for laboratory tools and equipment
* Logistics of certification programme in Rural Energy and Environment (UNAL-CAR covenant)
* Preparation of contracts and compliments of laboratory personnel and research projects
* Search of indexed journals for publication of research articles
* Management of purchased equipments
* Calibration of instrumentation tools
* Support research project in pico-hydro turbines
* Support research project in pyrolysis processes
* Support research project in solar refrigeration
profile_positions.title: Research Internship in Power Plants and Renewable Energies Laboratory

profile_positions.description:
Monitor at Power Plants and Renewable Energies Laboratory of the National University of Colombia during the academic periods 2019-2 and 2020-1

Activities:
* Assembly of equipment for laboratory practices
* Teaching in instrumentation, heat exchangers and boilers
* Support students in practical projects of the course 'Power Plants'
* Attendance and reports review
* Support teachers in practices of fuels characterization, pumps, fans and Rankine cycle
profile_positions.title: Monitor at Power Plants and Renewable Energies Laboratory

profile_positions.description:
Comfort consultant engineer for UNOA Team, participant of Solar Decathlon Latin America and Caribbean 2019, where I participate in the design and assemble process of a prototype of a self-sufficient, sustainable house with dual thermal design (passive/bioclimatic).

Activities:
* Characterization of thermal comfort requirements
* Simulation of prototype natural lighting in Grasshopper
* Calculation and simulation of heat transfer from outside the prototype
* Selection of façade materials for thermal and acoustic insulation
* Calculation of indoor thermal loads
* Design of model of exterior conditions/electrical consumption
* Dimensioning of natural and forced ventilation system and air conditioning
profile_positions.title: Comfort consultant engineer at UNOA Team (SDLAC 2019)

profile_positions.description:
Course Assistant at 'Biomass Transformation Technologies for Agro-industry Applications' in the framework of the XIII International Chair of Engineering

Activities:
* Coordination and monitoring of activities carried out by international teachers and students 
* Supporting students in feasibility evaluation and design projects with biomass technologies 
* Explain how technologies available in the laboratory work
profile_positions.title: Course Assistant at 'Biomass Transformation Technologies for Agro-industry Applications'

profile_positions.description:
Course Assistant at 'Design and simulation of small wind turbines and hydrokinetic water turbines' in the framework of the XIII International Chair of Engineering

Activities:
* Coordination and follow-up of activities carried out by international teachers and students 
* Support to students in handling OpenFOAM, QBlade, IDEAM database and JavaFoil tools 
* Laboratory preparation for prototype samples
profile_positions.title: Course Assistant at 'Design and simulation of small wind turbines and hydrokinetic water turbines'
